articles.title: China hits back at VP Harris, says US ‘selfish’ over Afghanistan - GMA News Online
articles.description: China on Tuesday held up America's chaotic withdrawal from Afghanistan as an example of Washington's "selfish" foreign policy, hitting back at Vice President Kamala Harris's accusations of intimidation in Asian waters.

articles.title: Many Older Americans Still Aren't Vaccinated, Making the Delta Wave Deadlier - The New York Times
articles.description: Compared with other highly vaccinated countries, large parts of the United States have many vulnerable seniors, helping spur hospitalization and death.
articles.content: The United States has a far higher share of seniors without full vaccine protection than many other wealthy countries, a key risk factor driving serious Covid-19 illness and death, a Times analysis s… [+9102 chars]
